name: Chess Clash - Play Online
description:
Test your logical skills with Chess Clash! Chess is one of the most popular strategy games of all time. Your goal is to capture your opponent's pieces and checkmate their king.

Play online and compete with players from all over the world. Invite your friends and challenge them to a match. Chat and exchange gifts with other players.

Try the two game modes — play the ‘Classic Chess’ mode for a relaxed match or the ‘Quick Chess’ mode for a more fast-paced match. Choose from a number of arenas that offer different match prizes.

Unlock and collect beautiful chess sets as you progress in the game. Get free rewards every day!

Compete with other players on the Leaderboards. Climb them up and win big prizes.

Key Features:

►Online multiplayer game
►Free daily rewards
►Invite and play with friends
►Chat with players and exchange gifts
►Multiple arenas with different prizes
►Two game modes — Classic Chess and Quick Chess
►Collect unique Chess pieces and Chess boards
►Compete with other players on the Leaderboard
►Supports offline play with computer

Stay tuned for more exciting features.

Download now and unleash the Chess master in you!
